description: Bank AA. It stores user funds in various assets and allows to withdraw them at any time.

field_descriptions.pubkey: Public key that signed a transaction.
field_descriptions.nonce: A unique number/string associated with this transaction.
field_descriptions.withdraw: Command to withdraw funds. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.transfer: Command to transfer funds to another user. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.asset: Asset ID (44 characters) to withdraw or transfer.
field_descriptions.amount: The amount you want to withdraw or transfer.
field_descriptions.recipients: Array of recipients to withdraw to or to deposit to.
field_descriptions.to: The address to receive a deposit or to withdraw/transfer funds to.
field_descriptions.authorize: Command to authorize a public key to sign on your behalf. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.revoke: Command to revoke a previously authorized public key. Set the value to 1.
